title: Essential Shelter Site Requirements
brief: Key factors to evaluate when selecting a survival shelter location.
steps: Ensure site contains materials needed for your shelter type.
Verify area is large enough and level enough to lie down comfortably.
Check that location provides concealment from enemy observation.
Confirm site has camouflaged escape routes available.
Assess if location is suitable for signaling if necessary.
Ensure protection from wild animals and falling rocks/trees.
Verify area is free from insects, reptiles, and poisonous plants.
warnings: Never ignore tactical situation or safety for comfort
Shelter must be small enough to contain body heat in cold climates
Most common error is making shelter too large
